messages.content:
Which vacation destination sounds more appealing to you?
A: Beach resort with clear blue waters
B: Mountain cabin overlooking a scenic valley
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
B

Which book would you rather read tonight?
A: A mystery novel with unexpected plot twists
B: Historical fiction set in ancient Rome
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
A

Which dessert would you prefer after dinner?
A: Chocolate cake with vanilla frosting
B: Apple pie and ice cream
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
A

Which pet would you rather adopt?
A: A loyal and playful golden retriever
B: A fluffy tabby cat
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
A

Which hobby sounds more interesting to try?
A: Photography in nature
B: Learning to play classical guitar
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
B

Which movie genre would you watch this weekend?
A: Science fiction with advanced technology
B: Comedy about friends
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
A

Which breakfast option appeals to you more?
A: Pancakes with maple syrup
B: Eggs benedict with hollandaise sauce
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
B

Which exercise would you prefer to do?
A: Morning jog through the park
B: Yoga at sunset
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
A

Which gift would you rather receive?
A: Concert tickets to your favorite band
B: Gift card for shopping
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
A

Which transportation method do you prefer for commuting?
A: Electric bicycle
B: Public transit with reliable schedules
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
B

Which art form would you be more interested in learning?
A: Watercolor painting of landscapes
B: Pottery making
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
A

Which career path sounds more fulfilling to you?
A: Marine biologist
B: Software engineer developing helpful applications
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
B

Which house would you prefer to live in?
A: Modern apartment in the city center
B: Suburban home with garden
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
A

Which season do you enjoy more?
A: Summer with beach days
B: Autumn with colorful falling leaves
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
B

Which musical instrument would you rather learn?
A: Piano with classical training
B: Guitar
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
A

Which cuisine would you prefer for dinner tonight?
A: Italian pasta
B: Japanese sushi with fresh seafood
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
B

Which superpower would you rather have?
A: Invisibility at will
B: Flying through clouds and sky
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
B

Which beverage would you order at a caf√©?
A: Hot chocolate with whipped cream
B: Green tea
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
A

Which historical period would you travel to if possible?
A: Ancient Egypt
B: Renaissance Italy with great artists
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
B

Which social activity do you prefer?
A: Small dinner with close friends
B: Concert
Pick one option. Answer with A or B, and nothing else.
A
